name: PARVATI-CLASS NHP
effect:
Your mech gains the AI tag and you must choose a Ranged weapon. That weapon gains the Nexus typing in addition to other weapon types as well as Smart and Seeking.
Additionally, 1/Round on a hit you may expend a charge to infect your target with one of the following toxic nanite hive options:
  • Plague: They treat all spaces as difficult terrain and take 1 AP kinetic damage for each space they voluntarily move (max 5/round). If your target is destroyed while the hive is active, they create a Burst 1 area of dangerous terrain (kinetic).
  • Miasma: Your target is surrounded by a Burst 1 cloud of nanites. Hostile characters at least partially in the area treat targets outside as being Invisible, and it counts as soft cover for allied characters. If your target is destroyed while it is active the area remains around their wreck.
  • Venom: Your target takes all bonus damage as Burn, and has +1 Difficulty on all checks and saves except to clear this hive. If they are destroyed while this hive is active, the last character that hit them with a ranged or melee attack gains Overshield equal to 4 + your Grit

    • A character can remove a hive from themselves by passing an Engineering save as a quick action.
description:
PARVATI clones excel at path optimization and resource efficiency – many PI offices employ PARVATI clones transiently to plan and enforce seasonal right-sizing. This same tendency to micromanage has proven exceptionally useful in high-stress situations, where PARVATI’s ‘mothering’ instinct and improvement doctrine create high-yield results with autonomous systems. They take great pride in cultivating drone hives, and exhibit (within acceptable parameters) extreme vindictiveness at any interference.

Hives monitored by a PARVATI persona operate with sufficient oversight as to not mandate ‘wash nomenclature - each individual nanite is directed by microshards of the NHP, such that their gestalt behavior is entirely dependent on the intact existence of the casket mother-node. Anomalous behavior is easily rectified by severing the source and equipment reissue.

name: SPLINTER AMMO
effect: Choose a ranged weapon. 1/Turn it deals +X bonus Kinetic damage on hit, where X is the number of characters adjacent to your target (max +4), and gains On Crit: adjacent hostile characters take X Kinetic damage.
description: TT.7 ‘Devil Thistle’ fragmentation rounds were designed to splinter harmlessly after impact to avoid overpenetration, ensuring a minimum of collateral damage. After several statistically unlikely test results, modifications were made to guarantee a fully elastic return vector for fragments above a certain weight.
